@notice builds a prefixed hash to mimic the behavior of eth_sign.
 @return hashed 32 bytes message with prefix
@notice destroy the contract and reclaim the leftover funds.
@notice emit rent payment event when ether is received

devdoc.author: Selim Sahnoun
devdoc.details: This is an experimental contract, no real estate goods are linked to it

claimPayment(uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes.details: check that the nonce wasn't used, then identify ownership of signature that needs to match the owner of contract then transfer

params._nonce: single use nonce to not withdraw twice

getHashedMessage(address,uint256,uint256.details: hash a message through a view function

devdoc.title: Handles the transfer of rent to tokens holders

claimPayment(uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes.notice: allow user to claim his rent payment

getHashedMessage(address,uint256,uint256.notice: returns a hashed message to sign

shutdown().notice: destroy the contract and reclaim the leftover funds.

userdoc.notice: Handles the transfer of rent to tokens holders. You can use this contract for only the most basic simulation
